skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-End refers to the client-side development of websites and applications. It involves creating user interfaces, optimizing performance, and ensuring a seamless user experience. Technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript are fundamental for Front-End development.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Back-End development involves server-side operations, databases, and system architecture. It focuses on data processing, logic, and APIs that power the functionality of websites and applications, ensuring seamless user experiences and efficient operations.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: UI (User Interface) and UX (User Experience) design encompass creating intuitive interfaces and seamless interactions that delight users. It involves crafting visually appealing layouts, optimizing usability, and empathetically understanding users' needs to enhance their overall digital journey.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Webflow Development leverages the intuitive platform to create stunning, custom websites. With its powerful design tools and seamless workflow, developers craft responsive sites, integrate dynamic content, and optimize user experiences for the web.

portfolio.title: Tindog
portfolio.description: Tindog is a clone of tinder another frontend project using Bootstrap.
